Text.Value: Makes you wonder how many traps I placed before you spotted me...
This trap is nothing compared to what I can do to you. Go on, try me.
You'll wish that trap had caught you by the time I'm done with you.
Just checking you were paying attention. Good job - you passed!
You're telling me you've never placed the odd trap? A misdemeanour, nothing more.
No harm done. I'll just pick it up and be on my way.
*Someone caught you stealing. Best give them a good reason not to kill you.*
*You've been caught breaking the rules. You have a horrible feeling the next thing broken might be your skull.*
*Your bad behaviour caught this guard's eye. What do you have to say?*
But locks were made to be opened. Otherwise they wouldn't have a key.
Locked. Unlocked. It's easily fixed. No harm done, is there?
You know us spellcasting types. Can't help showing off.
*You managed to talk your way in - no easy feat.*
*You've been granted free passage. What you do with that privilege is up to you.*
*Congratulations - you've convinced them to give you access. Now what?*
*Your conviction is enough. This will be taken no further. Nonetheless, this area remains forbidden.*
*Your words are enough to resolve the matter. Still, you need to leave.*
Try to convince them you belong here.

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: Only for trespassing, harder persuasion checks than talking your way out of it

Text.Value: Personally, I think it looks better like this.
Aren't we all broken, one way or another? That's called living.
No need to go causing a fuss over a little accident, is there?
*It seems thievery is not permitted here. Unfortunately for you, killing thieves is positively encouraged.*
*Your light fingers were too heavy this time - you've been caught stealing. What will you do?*
I was swatting away an insect - any contact was entirely accidental.
Someone cast a spell on me! They're the one you should be hunting down!
We weren't fighting. I was merely demonstrating a new martial technique.
My apologies. I seem to have taken a wrong turn...
You mean this isn't the shrine of Oghma? I knew that map was dodgy...
Would you look at that - my map's upside down! I should have turned right at that crossroads...
*Your spellcasting has angered one of the guards. You're headed for the cells.*
*Your spellcasting has caught this guard's eye. Time to explain yourself, or face the consequences.*
*You were caught casting a forbidden spell. This guard's come to make sure you don't do it again.*
I wasn't casting a spell. That was just a trick. Good, wasn't it?
Just testing your reflexes, keeping you sharp. I'm impressed.
I was trying to help. Now you'll never see the benefits of my little spell.
*It may have been unwise to reveal just how much gold you have on your person.*
*Your bribery attempt has caused some offence. Violence it is.*
*Some guards would appreciate your generosity, but not this one. This one prefers old-fashioned justice.*
*You should explain your vandalism, before anything else gets broken. Like your skull.*
*What a coincidence: you like breaking items, this guard likes breaking teeth. Choose your next move carefully.*
*Your destructive tendencies have attracted the attention of the guards. Do you have anything to say for yourself?*
*Destruction of property is a dangerous hobby. This guard has come to remind you of that.*
*Lockpicking is one way to enrage a guard. This one seems about ready to teach you a lesson.*
*You were seen picking a lock. Prison guards are rarely happy to let such behaviour slide.*
*Setting a trap is one way to enrage your captors. Your incarceration could be heading for a swift and violent end.*
*Setting a trap in prison was a bold move. Avoiding a return to your cell will require similar confidence.*
I'm here for a routine inspection. I'm sure your superiors will be very interested to know that you tried to deny me entry.
This is my place now. If you don't leave now, you won't leave at all.
That uniform of yours will make a very tasteful bodybag, if you don't get out of my way.
*Starting fights in prison is bad for your health. Especially if this guard has anything to say about it.*
*Violence amongst prisoners is not tolerated. It looks like you're about to learn that the hard way.*
Try to buy your way in. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_2_463b0f43-5410-412d-aba3-875cf81c38ca])

EditorData.logicalname: Trespass, expensive bribe to get permanent access

Text.Value: *You've been caught stealing. This guard looks ready to cut your sentence violently short.*
*You've been seen stealing from your cell. It's a low point, but this guard might be about to make things even worse...*
You really want to challenge someone you think is capable of murder?
Me - a killer? That would make me very dangerous indeed, wouldn't it?
If I committed murder, I guess I'd have to kill any witnesses, wouldn't I?
That's a protective trap. It's for your own protection.
I assure you that trap is completely harmless. Merely a deterrent.
A decorative replica only. I thought the place needed sprucing up.
How about a little something to smooth things over? ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])
Perhaps some gold would make up for my little indiscretion? ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])
Offer a bribe. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])
*You've been caught trespassing. Best explain yourself, before this gets out of hand.*
*You attacked someone. Only the guards are allowed to do that, as this one is about to demonstrate...*
*Violence isn't tolerated in these parts. Unless it's required to deal with a criminal like you...*
*You were seen committing an assault. This guard appears ready to respond in kind.*
You really want to challenge someone you think is capable of murder?
Me - a killer? That would make me very dangerous indeed, wouldn't it?
If I committed murder, I guess I'd have to kill any witnesses, wouldn't I?
*You've been seen causing trouble. Unfortunately for you, this guard likes causing trouble too.*
*Your wanton criminality is attracting attention. Perhaps you should defuse the situation, before things turn ugly.*
How about a little something to smooth things over? ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])
Perhaps some gold would make up for my little indiscretion? ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])
Offer a bribe. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])
*Getting caught setting that trap was a dangerous move. Resisting imprisonment may prove fatal.*
*Setting that trap has earned you a trip to the cells. This guard appears more than ready to escort you.*
Attack.
*Picking locks isn't good for your health. This guard's about to make sure of it.*
*You were seen picking a lock. Now this guard's picking a fight.*
Dangerous little things, lockpicks. Could wreak havoc on, say, an eyeball.
Lockpicking is only my second-favourite hobby. Killing interfering busybodies is my favourite.
Want to find out what else I can do with a lockpick? You won't like it.
Try to talk your way out of it.
*You were seen killing someone. Best explain yourself, before you're added to the body count.*
*Your murderous actions have given this guard the perfect excuse to eviscerate you. Any last words?*
*Murder is forbidden. Unless you're a guard, in which case it's called meting out justice. You're about to pay for your crimes.*

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: No BADASSCIVILIAN version because they never start this dialog for murder

Text.Value: *Killing someone is one way to get a guard's blood pressure up. You're destined for the cells, if you're lucky.*
*You murdered someone in view of a guard. Perhaps unsurprisingly, you're under arrest.*
Do you really care if the odd trinket goes missing?
Why bother yourself over a missing item or two? You're a busy individual - this is beneath you.
Since when is it a crime to admire fine craftsmanship? I just wanted a better look.
I wasn't casting a spell. That was just a trick. Good, wasn't it?
Just testing your reflexes, keeping you sharp. I'm impressed.
I was trying to help. Now you'll never see the benefits of my little incantation.
It was like that when I got here!
It was actually made like that in the first place. It's an Amnian technique. Very unusual.
I was trying to save it, but I was too late.
*They believe you - for now. But something tells you they won't be so receptive to your charms again.*
*You're free to go - this time. But next time, you won't be so lucky.*
*You've convinced them, for now. But transgress again, and no amount of talking will get you out of trouble.*
*Your vandalism has disturbed a guard. It appears you might be the next thing to get broken.*
*Vandalising your captors' property is one way to get yourself in trouble. Now would be a good time to explain yourself.*
There was something stuck in there. I was cleaning it out for you.
This isn't a lockpick, it's a toothpick! I was just freshening up.
I was merely admiring the metalwork. I'm something of a locksmith myself.
*You try your best, but your best just isn't good enough.*
*The guard is impassive. Your little speech was unconvincing.*
*Usually this is the point where the guard leaves you alone. But not today.*
*If your intention was to make things worse, you certainly succeeded.*
It's me - your old friend [GEN_PlayerName_c11eee1e-7815-6143-7233-f2427799fa53]! You wouldn't shut the door on a friend, would you?
I've been sent to join the patrol, there have been reports of someone trying to sneak in.
Why are you looking at me like that? I live here.
*A quick transaction, and your problem is miraculously resolved.*
*A gift of gold, and just like that, your troubles are over.*
*You wonder if all your problems could be so easily solved. For now it's enough to have solved this one.*
No need to fret over a harmless little charm, is there?
Everybody's casting that spell nowadays. It's all the rage out in Elturel.
It's not like that spell does any real harm. Just makes you feel a bit funny.
Just a bit of harmless fisticuffs. Nothing for you to worry about.
Let's not be hasty. No sense causing a fuss over a little disagreement, is there?
Please. That was barely a scuffle. No need to overreact.
*In some places, a spell like that would get you arrested. Here, it seems, it gets you killed.*
*Casting a spell like that is dangerous business. When a guard sees you do it, it's usually fatal.*
Interrupt me again, and my next spell will have you eating worg dung like it's a Midwinter feast.
I know just the spell for interfering busybodies. How do you feel about excruciating pain?
Mutter guttural syllables as though placing a particularly vile curse.
*That spell is against the rules. This guard is about to teach you what happens to rule-breakers.*
*Perhaps that spell was an unwise choice, given your current incarceration. This guard clearly thinks so.*
I was trying to help! Alas, I got here too late...
Shhh. Can't you tell when someone's taking a nap?
There's something... unnatural about this body. Get yourself to safety - I'll handle it.
Keep accusing me, and the next thing getting broken will be that loose jaw of yours.
Must have been an accident. Careful - you might have one yourself...
That was just for starters. Back off, or you're next.
I was trying to help! Alas, I got here too late...
Shhh. Can't you tell when someone's taking a nap?
There's something... unnatural about this body. Get yourself to safety - I'll handle it.
If you're so concerned it's working, why not test it yourself? I insist.
This trap is nothing compared to the pain I'll inflict if you don't back off.
Let's test it on you, shall we?
*It's wise to check the content of your purse before offering it to others.*
*It's customary to possess gold in order to bribe someone with it.*
*You don't have the gold to buy your way out of this situation.*
I'll take whatever I want, and you're not going to do a thing about it. Understood?
I'm happy to take something else. Your head, for example.
What's worth more to you - getting this back, or leaving here alive?
*You're being arrested for assault. Judging by the look on this guard's face, you're getting off lightly.*
*You were witnessed assaulting someone. You're headed for the cells.*
*You're free to go. But you know that you're being watched. It would be wise not to slip up again.*
*You've avoided any further trouble. Let's hope it stays that way.*
*The guard appears convinced. There's no need to take this further.*
*You managed to get away with it. Better not try your luck too often.*
Did I cast the wrong spell? I was trying to fix the lock, not open it.
I thought you wanted it unlocked? My mistake.
What spell? That was just a trick of the light.
*You've been caught admiring the cells. Perhaps you'd care to try one out for yourself?*
*Trespassing in a prison is one way to get yourself arrested. At least you won't have far to walk.*
This only ends two ways - you leave me alone, or you die. What will it be?
What is it you're accusing me of? Tell me, while you still have a functioning jaw.
Turn around and walk away. Trust me - you'll live longer.
*Your vandalism is causing considerable anger. It seems this individual is more than ready to put a stop to you.*
Try to buy your way in. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_2_463b0f43-5410-412d-aba3-875cf81c38ca])

EditorData.logicalname: Trespass, expensive bribe to get permanent access

Text.Value: *You've been caught trespassing. This guard seems determined to ensure you never make that mistake again.*
*You're stopped by a guard. It seems your presence here is forbidden.*
Acquiesce and follow to prison.
*There isn't enough gold in the world to undo the sight of a corpse.*
*A suspected murder is not something you can bribe your way out of.*
*Tempting as it is, the guard will not accept a bribe in this case.*
*Gold may have made your problem go away this time, but next time you won't be so lucky.*
*The benefit of the doubt can only be bought so many times. This was the last of those times.*
*Improperly-acquired coin weighs heavy on the conscience. The bribe may have worked this time, but it won't work the next.*
What if I say I'm very, very sorry?
You seem the merciful type. Can we let this one go?
I'm sorry - nobody taught me any better. You've shown me the error of my ways.
*You're being arrested for thieving. Unless you can find a way to settle this here and now.*
*You're being arrested for theft. If you have a defence, make it now.*
*You were seen disarming a trap. That's the kind of behaviour that will see you locked up. Or dead. Your choice.*
*Disarming someone else's trap is a one-way ticket to the cells. This guard seems more than willing to escort you.*
*Setting traps requires a subtle hand. This guard's punishment for you will require no subtlety whatsoever.*
*Getting caught setting a trap was the easy part. Getting away with it will be more of a challenge.*
I'm an innocent bystander! Honest!
I saw the criminal - they went that way!
I was just testing your observational skills. Congratulations - your eyesight is in full working order.
I think it's you who's found themselves in the wrong place.
Let me be, or you won't live to regret it.
You should be asking for my permission to be here. You're. In. My. Way.
It was a trap?! I could have been hurt!
A faulty trap's been reported. I think it's this one - best keep your distance.
Just admiring the mechanism. Nashkel-made, if I'm not mistaken.
Isn't it safer for everyone if this trap is disarmed? Including you?
What's one little trap? I'm sure you have plenty more.
Why do you even need this trap? Surely you're strong enough to deal with troublemakers yourself?
*You couldn't disarm the trap, but you alarmed this guard. Careful - you might get hurt.*
*Disarming traps is dangerous, but angering guards can be deadly. What will you do?*
*Disarming traps requires skill and finesse. Getting the attention of this guard required neither.*
*You've been spotted interfering with a trap. Tread carefully. This guard looks every bit as dangerous.*
No need to fret over a harmless little charm, is there?
Everybody's casting that spell nowadays. It's all the rage out in Elturel.
It's not like that spell does any real harm. Just makes you feel a bit funny.
*You were seen interfering with a trap. This guard is ready to teach you what happens to prisoners who do that...*
*You've been seen disarming a trap. Your incarceration could be heading for a swift and violent end.*
What is it you're accusing me of? Tell me, while you still have a functioning jaw.
Turn around and walk away. Trust me - you'll live longer.
This only ends two ways - you leave me alone, or you die. What will it be?
Since when is borrowing a crime?
This belongs to me! How dare you accuse me of stealing it?!
This item was stolen from me! If you'd done your job I wouldn't need to retrieve it!
Unlocking a lock can hardly be a crime. They're supposed to do that!
Do you really want to go to all this trouble over a bit of lockpicking?
Far worse goes on around here than lockpicking. Shouldn't you be focused on that?
Psh. That wasn't a fight. Want to see what I'm really capable of?
Unless you want to be next, I suggest you turn around and walk away.
Go on. Try me. I'm finished warming up.
*This area is off-limits. Perhaps the guard can be convinced otherwise.*
*This is a restricted area. Time to explain yourself, or this guard will be restricting you to a cell.*
*This guard seems rather put out. If locking you up hasn't worked, perhaps a more violent solution is required.*
*Even in prison, your criminal impulses are enough to anger the guards. You might want to explain yourself.*
*Your murderous impulses have caught this guard's attention. It seems your sentence is about to get cut short. As are you.*
*You were seen killing someone. Perhaps unsurprisingly, this guard wants a word.*
*Even imprisonment isn't enough to quell your murderous urges. Getting killed might be, though.*
*You killed another prisoner, and judging by the look in this guard's eye - you're about to be executed for it.*
Look - people like you and me don't need to waste our time debating who's where and why.
What even is trespassing, when you think about it? It's just 'being in a place'. Where's the crime in that?
Haven't you ever been turned around on your way to a date with destiny?
*There's a time and a place for smashing, but it appears this isn't it. You're getting locked up.*
*You were seen vandalising someone else's property. Now would be a good time to justify your actions.*
Do you see any blood on these hands? I'm an innocent witness.
It was self-defence - I was being attacked!
Do I look like a killer to you? I was raised better than that.
*Are there any doors that gold can't open? Perhaps, but not this one. You may enter as freely as you please.*
*Your pockets lightened, you are permitted to enter.*
*Trespassing? What trespassing? You were always welcome here.*
*Your violent behaviour is proving unpopular. Tread carefully, or things may get out of hand.*
I was trying to help! Alas, I got here too late...
Shhh. Can't you tell when someone's taking a nap?
There's something... unnatural about this body. Get yourself to safety - I'll handle it.
That's not the only spell I know. The other ones are much more dangerous.
For my next trick, I'll be unlocking the contents of your skull.
Interrupt me again and you'll be needing that spell to open your jaw.
*You've been caught lockpicking. Better surrender, or risk losing your hand.*
*This guard caught you picking a lock. Perhaps you'd like to try the lock of your very own cell?*
I know just the spell for interfering busybodies who get in my way. How do you feel about excruciating pain?
Interrupt me again, and my next spell will have you eating worg dung like it's a Midwinter feast.
Mutter guttural syllables as though placing a particularly vile curse.
Just a quick look around won't hurt anyone. You won't even know I was there.
Look at me - do I look dangerous?
Better act as if I'm allowed to be here rather than admit you let me get this far.
*Should you transgress again, your efforts to talk yourself out of trouble will be of little use.*
*Should you attempt such a feat again, you will find yourself on the deserving end of justice.*
*Best not try that again lest your actions speak louder than your words.*
Do you see any blood on these hands? I'm an innocent witness.
It was self-defence - I was being attacked!
Do I look like a killer to you? I was raised better than that.
What if I say I'm very, very sorry?
You seem the merciful type. Can we let this one go?
I'm sorry - nobody taught me any better. You've shown me the error of my ways.

Synopsis: An NPC wants to arrest a player for committing a crime (the NPC saw you commit the crime, or another NPC told them you did it). We have custom greeting nodes for the common crime types, and also fallbacks in case there is no prison, or in case this crime happens while the player was already in prison.
